Replies.Author: Gene
Replies.Content:
Sakamoto Maaya-san worked with Yoko Kanno on Macross Frontier, as far as I can remember. There are probably other ones, but that one strikes me as the most recent.

\>Ryougi’s a quad core

lolwut

Replies.Author: Chris
Replies.Content:
The first I heard her was in the ED to Wolf’s Rain, though the first time I really noticed her voice was also when she played Ryougi Shiki from KnK. She’s got a really nice voice (both speaking and singing). I didn’t know Shiki’s 3rd personality had a blank name, interesting tidbit.

_And she won first in 2D-character-that-you-want-to-take-as-your-bride contest in Japan_

lolwut

Replies.Author: Grant Walker
Replies.Content:
I remember being surprised when I first found out the lady who plays Nino also played Mari… they’re so different I never would have guessed. It’s a bit easier to see the connection to Ouran’s Haruhi and Akashi-san, though, that’s for sure!

I’ve never seen Kara no Kyoukai, though. Looks pretty interesting.

_「 」is the third personality, who is the real murderous one. By the way, I’m NOT trying to keep the name secret or anything. It’s the OFFICIAL NAME._

lolwut

Replies.Author: Jack
Replies.Content:
Asuka will be back in the third movie. They have rebuilt her: made her better, faster, stronger. They have made…

PIRATE ASUKA

On another note, it’s neat to see how many different roles these seiyuus play. Maybe I just suck at hearing it, or she’s good at doing different voices, but I didn’t catch the same person voicing Akashi-san and Haruhi. I will now be unable to watch series with seiyuus I’ve heard before without attempting to force myself to recognize the voice.

_If you can laugh after seeing this, I think you’ve played enough Konami games. Wait, never mind. You can never play enough Konami games._

C-C-C-COMBO BREAKER

[trollface.jpg]
